0.Name: Sign
0.Text: YE WHO ENTER THESE TREACHEROUS GROUNDS, PREPARE FOR THE BATTLE OF A LIFETIME!!!

0.Name: Me
0.Text: I can't believe they let me write that.

1.Name: Me
1.Text: I don't even want to look at it anymore.

0.Name: Me
0.Text: Better get out of here before he wakes up...

1.Name: Me
1.Text: Good thing we had that baby blanket left over after construction.

0.Name: Boss
0.Text: Hey! What are you still doing down there?

0.Name: Boss
0.Text: Now get out of there before he wakes up!

0.Name: Me
0.Text: Well, I'm right next to the elevator, I should make it out in time.

0.Name: Sign
0.Text: LYING BEYOND YE ARE DEADLY TRAPS NOT BEKNOWNST TO THE LANDS OF MAN

0.Name: Greg
0.Text: yoooooo! sup skelly. watcha doin around here?

0.Name: Me
0.Text: Hey Greg. Could ask you the same.

0.Name: Greg
0.Text: chill bruh, you know how its been with jess, i gotta dungeon-surf for a bit.

0.Name: Me
0.Text: I just lost my keys, gotta take the long route back.

1.Name: Greg
1.Text: same as you, spiked myself. best way to get around.

1.Name: Me
1.Text: I gotta do that again??? It realllly hurts...

1.Name: Greg
1.Text: that's what I'M sayin. gotta call OSHA or some shit.

0.Name: Me
0.Text: How did you even get here?!

0.Name: Greg
0.Text: its like most of what i do.

0.Name: Greg
0.Text: listen man, life is like a river. sometimes it stinks. but sometimes it's like awesome.

0.Name: Greg
0.Text: me n you, we're gonna stick it to the man. we're gonna get boss back for putting us down here.

0.Name: Me
0.Text: Thanks man... I'm glad we're on the same page.

3.Name: Greg
3.Text: peace n love *throws up peace sign*

0.Name: Sign
0.Text: BEFORE YE VER EYES IS YE FIRST AND QUITE POSSIBLY YE LAST BATTLE

0.Name: Sign
0.Text: DEFEND YER HONOR AND YE LIFE-

1.Name: Best Writer of All Time
1.Text: I put my heart and soul into this.

0.Name: Greg
0.Text: i've trained for this day for a millenia.

0.Name: Greg
0.Text: come at me with all you've got.

0.Name: Greg
0.Text: just kiddin man. it's me! greg!

0.Name: Greg
0.Text: got ya worried there huh? got ya real worried.

0.Name: Greg
0.Text: you were all like NOOOO DONT KILL ME!

0.Name: Me
0.Text: You got me good for sure.

0.Name: Greg
0.Text: anyways. exits up and to the right, so.

0.Name: Greg
0.Text: pretty sure boss wants to have a word with you, but don't worry.

0.Name: Me
0.Text: Thanks Greg. You're a good guy.
